properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Youvvanulaaraa mee youvanamulo santasinchudi Aite mee panulanu batti meeku theerpu kalugunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keedukai parugeththedu mee paadamulanu Kristesanedu bandapai nilipiyunchi Sidda manassanedu jodu meeru todugukoni Rakshana samaachaaramunu prachurinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apavitratato nindina mee hastamulanu Aa Yesayya rakthamulo kadugukoni Pavitramaina chetulanu prabhuvaipu chaapi Parishuddaalayamu nandu praardinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Narakamunu badadroya galigina meedu Naalukalanu badramuga chesikonuchu Stutinyichi keerthinchudi prabhu Yesuni Athipriyamuna mee naalukalatho ellappudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abyantara parachedu mee netramulanu Aashraya durgamupai stiraparachi Mahimatmato rakshanakartayagu kristuni Mahimanu chuchutaku upayoginchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hita bodanu sahimpani mee durada chevulanu Kalpana kadhala vaipunaku thrippakunda Challani mellani prabhu Yesu swaramunu Satyamu vinutaku mee chevulaniyyudi{/lang-eng}
